name: Little Guardian
description:
Fend off a boss and its horde of minions to prevent them from tearing apart your small, destructible world. Start with nothing, and build up your powers during the boss fight.

Gamepad controls: a, x and joystick.
Keyboard controls: z, x, arrows.

Game made from scratch in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 45, by:

JUSTCAMH - Programmer, Artist and Game Developer
ClockMaker - Musician and Sound Designer

Grab the OST!
